name: rngimrcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crngs, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))

stmt.origin: elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, crngs, c2, universe, universe, crab(hs2, co(cv(hs0), crngh, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), crngh, cv(hs0)))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crngs, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))

-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)

⊣ RngIsom =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { hs2 ∈(hs0[RngHomo]hs1)| `' hs2 ∈(hs1[RngHomo]hs0)})
